update water_amount
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WA_NUMBER = #{waNumber,jdbcType=REAL},
WA_MONTH = #{waMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WA_BIGEN_DATE = #{waBigenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
WA_END_DATE = #{waEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
WA_WRITER = #{waWriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WA_FLAG = #{waFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WA_ID = #{waId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update water_amount set BUILDING_FULL_ROOM = #{buildingFullRoom,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WA_NUMBER = #{waNumber,jdbcType=REAL}, WA_MONTH = #{waMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WA_BIGEN_DATE = #{waBigenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, WA_END_DATE = #{waEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, WA_WRITER = #{waWriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WA_FLAG = #{waFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WA_DOSAGE = #{waDosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH_FEE = #{monthFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WA_ID = #{waId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
